ygData.messageBody:
Hi, my character's name is Ebonsith and I'd like to have a gathering on the
E'ci server.... for the evil races. This gathering will focus on the
sharing of knowledge of research of all classes that can use it as well as
the sharing of languages. Perhaps we could all stand in a small circle and
spam each other in the many languages of the land until we can understand
each other enough to actually talk about things in those languages =)

If you're interested let me know at golbez01@...
